children.title: Search Movie Quotes
bullets: Created and maintaining webapp with 147,000+ users around the world
Implemented custom fuzzy search to instantly filter 97,000+ quotes and support highlight indices
Improved UX by rendering thousands of quotes 300x faster with virtualized lists
Designed and implemented supporting API for user authentication and user submissions
Refactoring 30+ components to use React Hooks API for better code maintainability

children.title: SMQ Database Builder
bullets: Created Node.js CLI tool to build the database for SearchMovieQuotes.com
Designed and implemented parsers for .srt and .vtt captions
Streamlined build by fetching .xml and chunked .vtt files from Netflix and Disney+
Implemented custom Node.js wrappers for FFmpeg and ImageMagick to automatically generate thumbnails
Refactored to use TypeScript using good OO practices and test-driven development with Mocha and Chai
Developing data scrubbing rules for text for the hearing impaired and to form complete sentences 98% of the time

children.title: University of British Columbia
children.subtitle: Teaching Assistant, Models of Computation
bullets: Collaborated in a team of 13 TAs to support learning in a fast-paced summer course
Presented to a group of about 20 students 6 times a week
Developed script to automate testing students' RegExp and graded assignments in a timely manner
